Name: 7 Tesla MRI of the ex vivo human brain at 100 micron resolution
HowToAcknowledge: Edlow BL, Mareyam A, Horn A, et al. Data from: 7 Tesla MRI of the ex vivo human brain at 100 micron resolution. OpenNeuro https://openneuro.org/datasets/ds002179, doi:10.18112/openneuro.ds002179.v1.1.0 (2019).
Acknowledgements:
We thank Michelle Siciliano and Terrence Ott for assistance in obtaining and processing the brain specimen; Simon Sigalovsky for assistance with coil construction; Gunjan Madan for assistance with coil testing and evaluation; L.
